dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: You're relieved?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I think I am.   (not wanting to talk about it)   I’m also starving... Chessy around?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She and Martin went off on a picnic around noon... yester
(Nick looks up on that one)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hopefully they'll be back... soonish...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who would've thought my Nanny and you Butler...  (then)  So, listen, how 'bout I whip us up something to eat?

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: You know how to cook now?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: of course, I )mow how to cook.  I can make pasta... and pasta... and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pasta sounds good.

dialogues.speaker: UPSTAIRS HALLWAY
dialogues.text: Nick, now clean shaven and wearing fresh clothes, passes room.  Inside, we SEE Hallie and Annie in pajamas, gettin Hallie  Wow!  You look so nice, where are you going.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (shutting their door)  Good night, Ladies!

dialogues.speaker: INT.
dialogues.text: Elizabeth sets the table as Nick enters.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Smells good in here.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Really?  I'm just boiling water.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: oh. Then it must be you...  (takes out wine glasses)  So what are you in the mood for, red or white?

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: I think red.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Follow me...

dialogues.speaker: INT.
dialogues.text: leading to Nick's private WINE CELLAR.  A cavernous space beautiful lanterns.  The walls are lined with bottles of the walls, library style.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: This is where I keep my private stash. Did you know I als collect wine?

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Oh really?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm a man of limited interests. Elizabeth laughs.  Nick leads her into a small cozy room, bottle from a rack.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Here's a 1921 Burgundy... They say the rain that year mad the best Burgundy ever harvested... Oh wait, you'll appre

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shows her another bottle)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (reads label)  Vi Day, 1946... incredible.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Yeah, I love that...  (shows her another bottle)  The same wine my parents served at their wedding... a 152 Bordeaux.  I think my sister was conceived off this baby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this-one?  (reads label)  Where Dreams Have No End... 1983.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: That one actually took me years to track down.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Why, where's it from? 127

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: It's the wine we drank at our wedding.  I now have every bottle ever made.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: (completely thrown)  You do?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I do.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Can we open one?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You're the only one I'd drink it with. Nick pulls a bottle from the shelf, dusts it off.  He loo Elizabeth and sees her eyes are teary.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You okay?

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Just got a little dust in my eye...

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: I can offer you a clean sleeve to...

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: (pulling back from the offer)   No, no, I'm fine, now.  Really.' All better.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: You don't always have to be so brave, you know.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Oh, but I do, actually... just then, they HEAR the cellar door opening above them a

dialogues.speaker: CHESSY, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Anybody home? Nick hesitates, looks to Elizabeth, who shrugs.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Yeah... We're on our way up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nick and Elizabeth climb the stairs and enter the KITCHEN greeted by Martin and Chessy.  Martin wears shades and a

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Welcome back... How was the picnic?

dialogues.speaker: CHESSY
dialogues.text: Who knew the man wanted to eat in L.A.?  We drove eight h have a picnic in a city with no parks.

dialogues.speaker: MARTIN
dialogues.text: But what a town!  I saw mountains, beaches, I saw Michael not to mention I found out I have the same hand size as J as John Barrymore.

dialogues.speaker: CHESSY
dialogues.text: The man is a lot to handle... but a lot of fun.  How was the camping trip?  Aren't you back early?  Are we interru We are.  Let's go, Marty.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: No, no, you're not interrupting anything. Are you hungry? the mood for some pasta? Nick looks at Elizabeth, wishing she hadn't invited them

dialogues.speaker: CHESSY
dialogues.text: You don't mind?  We haven't eaten since Hearst Castle.

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: No, no, it's fine.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: I'll set the table for two more... As Chessy and in Join them, Nick slips the bottle of-wine and closes the door.

dialogues.speaker: ON A ROW OF SUITCASES
dialogues.text: lined up IN FRONT OF NICK'S HOUSE.  CAMERA TILTS UP as El comes down the front steps and joins Annie and Martin, wh

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Okay, then, I guess that's that.  We're really off this time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: sadly watching as a Cab Driver loads the baggage into the The Girls hug and promise to see each other over Thanksgi and promise to see each other over Christmas... Then Nick and Elizabeth hug in a distant way and let go v

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: Take care of yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You too. The trunk is closed and Elizabeth hugs Hallie hard... Nic Annie.  Elizabeth, Annie and Martin wave, then duck into pulls off, Chessy, Hallie and Sammy all look up to Nick.

dialogues.speaker: EXT.
dialogues.text: A Taxi ENTERS FRAME, rounds a corner and pulls up in fron Elizabeth's town house.

dialogues.speaker: INT.
dialogues.text: Elizabeth and Annie ENTER, dropping their bags by the fro door.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Hi ... We're home  They don't bear anything.  Annie  (calls out)  Grandfather?

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: I'll check his study. Elizabeth ENTERS THE STUDY, and sure enough, there he is, the desk, hidden behind The Financial Times.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Hey stranger...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The paper comes down and Elizabeth SEES it's Hallie sitting behind the desk. Hallie  Hi, Mom.  Did you know the Concorde gets you here in half the time?

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: (stunned)   Yeah, I've heard that...  Annie arrives in the door behind Elizabeth, shocked to se Hallie.  Annie    What are you doing here?  Hallie  it took us around thirty seconds after you left to realiz didn't want to lose you two again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We?

dialogues.speaker: NICK
dialogues.text: (appears from the doorway  behind Hallie)  We. I made the mistake of not coming after you once, Lizz I wasn't going to do it again... no matter how brave you 'Elizabeth looks across the study at Nick, her eyes once up, a smile on her face.

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH
dialogues.text: Thank you. They stand frozen, their eyes locked on each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Annie  Pssst.... She signals for Hallie to Join her in the hall.

dialogues.speaker: EXT.
dialogues.text: Hallie rushes up to Annie. Hallie  We did it!  We did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hug. Annie     It's unbelievable. Hallie OhmyGod, you guys are gonna love living in California.... Annie What do you mean ... California?  You two are going to lo in London... Hallie  London???

dialogues.speaker: ELIZABETH AND NICK
dialogues.text: embracing by the window.  CAMERA PULLS BACK through the W CONTINUES into THE FRONT YARD, revealing Chessy and Marti CAMERA BOOMS UP and AWAY finally REVEALING Sammy barking Poodle in the yard next door.  And as Grandfather walks d garden gate and enters the path to the house, we fade out
